DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Describe feasibility implement BBCEI . II . Describe cultural linguistic appropriateness BBCEI . III . Determine topic require emphasis BBCEI . IV . Identify way enhance program content , format , material . OUTLINE : Participants undergo 2 tailored BBCEI session within 1 month . At begin first session research nurse present participant list common physical social concern . The participant ask identify 3 topic want discus . The research nurse discus participant relevant supportive care resource make appropriate referral . At second session focus BBCEI psychological spiritual well-being .
